content: When you have all 6, you'll want to take them to the area where you fight The Stone Vanguard, near Rockrest Flat. Putting them into the rock in the arena will reveal a secret boss called Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Buddha's Eyeballs - Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
When you have all 6, you'll want to take them to the area where you fight The Stone Vanguard, near Rockrest Flat. Putting them into the rock in the arena will reveal a secret boss called Shigandang.
